document.docAuthor: Almeida, Thaís Melo de, Stefanello, Fabiano & Hamada, Neusa
document.masterDocTitle: Belostomatidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) held in the Invertebrate Collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil: inventory and new distributional records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Belostomatidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) held in the Invertebrate Collection of the Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas da Amazônia, Manaus, Brazil: inventory and new distributional records

bibRefCitation.author: Estevez, A. L. & Polhemus, J. T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Estevez, A. L. & Polhemus, J. T. 2001. The small species Belostoma (Hemiptera: Belostomatidae). I. Introduction, key to species groups and a revision of the denticolle group. Iheringia, Serie Zoologia, 91: 151 - 158.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Known distribution: BRAZIL :
Amazonas ( Estévez & Polhemus, 2001 ), Bahia ( Estévez & Polhemus, 2001 ), Santa Catarina ( Estévez & Polhemus,2001 ).
VENEZUELA :
Calabozo ( Estévez & Polhemus, 2001 ).

caption.paragraph:
Figure 6. Distribution of Belostomatidae in South America. Red symbol: known records, yellow symbol: new records. (A) =
Belostoma amazonum
(circle),
B. denticolle
(square). (B) =
B. gestroi
(square),
B. dilatatum
(circle),
B.ripicolum
(triangle).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Notes: This is the first record of
B. amazonum
to Mato Grosso and Roraima states ( Brazil ).
